summary: This mod is a stahlrim weapons and shield replace mod excepted arrow.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=6]Skyrim Stalhrim Weapons and Shield Replace[/size][/b]



[youtube]1-l6ZBPwUJA[/youtube]



[b][size=4][Description][/size][/b]
[size=3]This mod is a stahlrim weapons and shield replace mod excepted arrow.
Now ice is glow and inside of ice has refraction, So you can see a different appearance according to your move. (but not transparent.)
This mod only changes meshes and textures. There is no esp file.
[/size]

[b][size=4][Installation][/size][/b]
[size=3]If you use MO or NMM, there is no special to do. Install it like another mod.
If you don’t use them, unpack the mod files and put in here.
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data[/size]


[b][size=4][ UNINSTALATION][/size][/b]
[size=3]If you use MO or NMM, there is no special to do. Delete it like another mod.
If you don’t use them, delete these files.
Data\Meshes\dlc02\weapon\stahlrim
Data\Meshes\dlc02\armor\stahlrim shield
Data\Textures\dlc02\weapon\stahlrim
Data\Textures\dlc02\weapon\stahlrim shield[/size]


[b][size=4][Used tool]
[/size][/b][size=3]
Photoshop, Nifskope[/size]



[b][size=4][Permissions][/size][/b]

[size=3]please let me know beforehand. [/size]


Enjoy !





[size=3]------------------------------------------------

I have completed requested stalhrim armors

[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88057]https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88057[/url]

------------------------------------------------[/size]
